author: costin
msg: Add the host automatically. We don't really need the Host object to be anything -
we map to Context and we get the Host object from there.
( well, Wrapper is the only object that needs to be mapped )
Few methods to display the info ( for JMX console use )

author: costin
msg: Deal with Hosts. Use JMX for hosts, remove some deps.

author: costin
msg: Get the Host from the Context, it simplifies the mapping  and registration of Hosts

author: costin
msg: Set the domain in the mapper - so it maps only for our engine ( ==domain )
Register the mapper in JMX - we can see what's inside.
